All Classes

Class
Description
AbstractObject
The abstract class is defined to by extended for example by "file" or "folder"
AllConverters
The interface defines the converters
AllFiles
The class calls the Dropbox API /list_folder and can either return all or some files
Controller
The class is the controller that sets the paths in localhost:8080
Converter
The class implements the converters
File
File class that extends the abstract class AbstractObject
FileNotFoundException
File not found exception
FilterBoth
The class filters the ArrayList by size and/or modification date
FilterDate
The class filters the ArrayList by last modification date in DropBox
FilterException
Filter exception
FilterManager
The class manages the two filters, the last modification date and size filter
FilterSize
The class filters the ArrayList by size
Folder
Folder class that extends the abstract class AbstractObject
IncorrectFormatException
Incorrect format exception
ProgettoOopApplication
The class starts the SpringBoot application
Search
This interface defines the searching methods
SearchImpl
This search class is specific for searchig files with jolly characters like *
TypeNotRecognisedException
Type not recognised exception
